barriers.headline: Your Vision.
barriers.intro: You carry the vision of your own exclusive cosmetics brand inside you - a product that not only bears your signature but convinces through uncompromising quality and real results. But the path from idea to your own asset is often rockier than expected.
barriers.subheadline: Before you can even start, the market puts three massive hurdles in your way.
barriers.barrier1Text: Minimum order quantities of 10,000 units or more. An investment risk that kills innovation before it even starts.
barriers.barrier2Text: You have the vision, the commitment, the marketing gene or all of the above, but no chemistry lab. On your own, without deep understanding of ingredients, you fly blind. You don't need a traditional contract manufacturer who just processes orders, but a partner who shares your vision.
barriers.barrier3Text: Established manufacturers often completely ignore smaller inquiries. Add to that the constant fear of strict EU regulations: Who is liable for errors? Without the right partner, you bear all the risk alone.
barriers.transition: And even if you overcome these hurdles...

faq.headline: Everything You Need to Know.
faq.subheadline: Transparency is part of our DNA. Here you find answers to the most important questions.

items.question: Who owns the formula in the end?
items.answer: 100% ownership for you. Unlike the industry standard, there is no renting of formulas with us. After completion of development, you are the sole rights holder of the IP (Intellectual Property). You receive the complete formula and can theoretically have it produced anywhere.

items.question: How do I know I will be satisfied with the product?
items.answer: Security through Pre-Check. Before we accept an order or payment is made, we conduct a feasibility check. We only implement projects where we are sure they are technologically feasible. Through the physical lab samples, you can test and adjust the product until it 100% matches your vision.

items.question: Do I need to have chemical knowledge myself?
items.answer: No. You bring the vision and the marketing gene, we provide the science. You just need to describe what your product should achieve or what skin feel you are aiming for. We translate your wishes into a highly effective formula.

items.question: Are products included in the IP Builder?
items.answer: The IP Builder focuses on the core: the development of your unique formula including lab samples. If you want to start directly with a ready-to-sell batch (e.g., 100 units), the Market Launch package is the right choice for you.

items.question: Are the products safe?
items.answer: Absolutely. Every product goes through the legally required tests (microbiology, stability, microbial load). We work strictly according to the EU Cosmetics Regulation and create the necessary safety report (CPSR) so that your product is legally compliant on the market.

items.question: How long does the process take?
items.answer: A serious development including the legally recommended stability tests typically takes about 4 to 6 months. Quality and safety cannot be rushed if you want to build a long-term successful asset.

items.question: How much say do I have?
items.answer: Full say with maximum honesty. We respect your wishes 100%. However, if a wish is not allowed by regulation (EU law) or is technologically unstable, we communicate this openly and immediately suggest working alternatives.
